item.description:
This is a lunch buffet at an excellent Indian restaurant (Kevin and I tested the food there personally last month.). There have been several requests for this event, so I hope everyone interested can attend.
The cost is $10.99. This does not include tax, tip or beverages.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Brunch at Rasoi
